destination.destinationContent:
Here in Atlantis you'll find that there's nothing more relaxing than pulling up a beach chair and staring at the sun for hours on end. Sunglasses? Nah, who needs them? Filler text and some more text just to make this longer.

I'm really trying to see how much text is appropriate to fit inside this box, so I'll write a lot of text to find out. This is quite a lot of text to read, I hope it is replaced with something more interesting someday.
destination.destinationContentShort: Here in Atlantis you'll find that there's nothing more relaxing than pulling up a beach chair...
destination.destinationUrl: this points to the specific thumbnail to load initially.

destination.destinationContent:
Do your friends leave you hanging when you try to celebrate getting that prime parking space? Worry no more on this exotic trip to Argentina where you can high-five with your new best buds from sun up to sun down.

Note that we are not responsible for any high-fiving related injuries, bro.

destination.destinationContent:
You want some filler text? I got some for you right here. Here's as much as you can handle, I'm the best text placeholder you've ever laid eyes upon.

Don't believe me? Well fine, that's ok I guess. Sorry.

destination.destinationContent:
Nachos. Sharks. Nachos and sharks. Together at last.
